parameter.name: jobId
parameter.description: The unique ID of the Job Opening record for which the associated candidate status has to be changed.

parameter.name: candidateIds
parameter.description: The comma separated candidate ids for which the status has to be changed, with respect to the job opening.

parameter.name: candidateStatus
parameter.description: The status of the resume with respect to the job opening.

parameter.name: comments
parameter.description: The comments for why the status is being changed.
